description:
Do you get overwhelmed with studying for your class or test? Are you struggling with knowing the best way to study? Do you have test anxieties? Would you like to know how to read with comprehension to prepare for your tests? Do you find your self procrastinating or running out of time to prepare for tests?

If you answered yes to one or all of these questions than this course is for you.

Introducing...

Study Smarter Not Harder

Study Skills Course

In 4 short modules, here's what you will know when you take this course:

Module 1: Preparing with SAS

Module 2: 5 Steps for understanding what you read

Module 3: Test taking strategies for multiple choice

Module 4: Relieving test anxiety

Bonus program: Goal setting and Time Management

Module 5:Goal Setting for Success

Module 6: 7 Time Management Tips

This course is ideal for students and teachers looking to improve study skills for positive test results. Clear, concise, and all you need to start studying smart today!

Enroll Now!
title: How to Study Smarter Not Harder
